cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(toInc ` c0)
⊣ d(hs1, c1)
⊣ d(hs1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cipo, c0))
-| diffsc(hs1, c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(toInc ` c0)
⊣ d(hs1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cipo, c0))
